item.title: Senate moves to declare conservative icon's birthday as the 'National Day of Remembrance for Charlie Kirk'
item.description: A U.S. Senate resolution designates Oct. 14, 2025, as a day for Americans to reflect on conservative commentator Charlie Kirk's civic contributions.
